nodes.text: Within a Minute: The Making of Episode III

< is a 2005 documentary on the making of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. It is hosted by Rick McCallum, and focuses on who and what was involved in the making of 49 seconds of the film. Within a Minute deals with each department involved in the film. According to McCallum, he came up with the idea for the documentary in 2002, while watching a screening of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, which many in attendance stayed through the end credits for.
The documentary is included on the Revenge of the Sith DVD.
